entry.title: The DANGEROUS Streets Of Philadelphia: Violence, Drugs & Free Needles in Kensington

media:group.media:title: The DANGEROUS Streets Of Philadelphia: Violence, Drugs & Free Needles in Kensington
media:group.media:description:
I spent 4 days on the streets of Philadelphia to document the drug crisis plaguing this historic city. From being doused with urine, to getting attacked for reporting on Prevention Point’s needle exchange program, the streets here are no joke.
For more info on this piece, checkout the article I wrote: https://thepostmillennial.com/savanah-hernandez-reports-dem-backed-needle-exchange-org-helps-addicts-stay-desperate-and-homeless-in-philly _________________________________________________________ SUPPORT MY WORK: CASHAPP: https://cash.app/$SavSays WEBSITE: https://www.savsaysofficial.com/ SUBSCRIBESTAR: https://www.subscribestar.com/savanah-hernandez _________________________________________________________ FOLLOW ME: INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/savwith1n/ TRUTH SOCIAL: https://bit.ly/SavSays RUMBLE: https://rumble.com/user/Sav_says _________________________________________________________ PODCAST:https://www.podbean.com/pu/pbblog-v88 APPLE PODCAST: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast SPOTIFY: https://open.spotify.com/show/7dSvMv7 _________________________________________________________ MAILING ADDRESS: 10730 Potranco Rd Suite 122 Box 499 San Antonio, TX 78251

entry.title: NIGHTMARE CITY: How Portland’s Decriminalization Of Hard Drugs Destroyed The City

media:group.media:title: NIGHTMARE CITY: How Portland’s Decriminalization Of Hard Drugs Destroyed The City
media:group.media:description:
I spent the week in Portland to highlight the underreported issues plaguing the once beautiful city. From bags of human feces littering the streets, to open drug use and miles of homeless encampments, we venture into how Portland is faring 2 years after decriminalizing hard drugs.
For more statistics and details on Portland, checkout my article here: https://thepostmillennial.com/savanah-hernandez-reports-how-portlands-decriminalization-of-hard-drugs-destroyed-the-city _________________________________________________________ AMERICAFEST 2022: If you would like to meet me in person I will be attending TPUSA's AmericaFest, Dec 17-20th! entry.title: Beto Supporters Don't Know Why They're Voting For Him

media:group.media:title: Beto Supporters Don't Know Why They're Voting For Him
media:group.media:description:
Ahead of the Texas race for governor I went to UT Austin to ask students who they're voting for Beto or Abbott. Of course the majority said Beto, but of course couldn't say why...

entry.title: Biden Celebrates As Crime & Economic Collapse Surge

media:group.media:title: Biden Celebrates As Crime & Economic Collapse Surge
media:group.media:description:
The 21st anniversary of 9/11 was this past Sunday and I went to the college campus in UT Austin to check in on how younger Americans felt about the subject. Americans are now paying more in taxes than they do for food and the price of groceries has surged to the highest level we’ve seen since 1979. Despite this, Biden felt today was a great day to celebrate getting inflation "under control". We’re talking economic collapse, the death of patriotism in America and the intense crime surge we’re witnessing as our leaders turn their back on the USA. _______________________________________________________ OLDE COUNTRY SOAP: Checkout my favorite all-natural, locally sourced soaps from https://www.oldecountrysoap.com/. entry.title: Europe’s Energy Crisis Is Out Of Control | Guest: Lewis Brackpool

media:group.media:title: Europe’s Energy Crisis Is Out Of Control | Guest: Lewis Brackpool
media:group.media:description:
Citizens in countries from Germany to France are beginning to protest as their energy bills continue to skyrocket. From Italy lighting candles due to the intense increase on their energy bills, to the UK now hosting game shows where getting your “energy bill” paid is now a huge prize, we can look to Europe’s green energy policies and dependency on Russian oil, as an example as to what could come to America if we continue to rely on foreign oil while pushing ineffective green energy policies. Lewis Brackpool, Rebel news reporter and UK citizen joins me to discuss. _________________________________________________ OLDE COUNTRY SOAP: Checkout my favorite all-natural, locally sourced soaps from https://www.oldecountrysoap.com/.
